ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Bard Armor
ygData.msgSnippet: Heh and to clarify further: It was dropped by a Dragon which had never been killed before on _any_ server. **looks around for the guys in black suits with
ygData.messageBody:
Heh and to clarify further:

It was dropped by a Dragon which had never been killed before on _any_
server.

**looks around for the guys in black suits with mirrored shades**

SHH!!! They're all after me!


> em listens for the sound of Black Helicopters(tm)....
>
> Well, not exactly "found" on a server. Afaik, it was dropped in the first
> kill of Trakanon - the poison dragon when Fires of Heaven took him down
> early this weekend. Not like "finding" a foraged item or a bag on the
> ground in the woods.
>
> Sylly
>
> > A patch goes on the server. THEN a Singing Breatplate is found on a
> > server.
>
